name: Soy biodiesel, production, at plant
description:
1. CARBON SEQUESTRATION should be accounted for after the product is built in its LCA model, and should be included depending on the use of end of life fate of that product.  
BIODIESEL: 77% C --> 2.823 kg CO2/kg biodiesel.
2. The study (Main Data Source) underwent external peer review prior to this submission to the US LCI database.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Current technologies (mix of older and newer)
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
